description.p: Welcome to Alpha Anywhere Community Edition Beginner Tutorial. We'll show you how to build a simple "Hello, World!" application for a web browser and mobile device, all in about 15 minutes time.
This tutorial is broken into 3 chapters: [Installing], [Building], and [Testing]
If you have two monitors, we recommend you keep this tutorial open on one monitor while you do the tutorial on the other monitor.
If you have one monitor, leave this tutorial open in your browser and use *[ui:Alt]*+*[ui:Tab]* to switch between Alpha Anywhere and this tutorial.
Let's get started. Click the button below to begin.
